title.rendered: FREE $10 Gift Card + D.C. Progress + New Shirt!

content.rendered:
Receive a $10 gift card FREE with every $25 gift card you buy!

We have one more week of our crazy-awesome gift card promotion! For every $25 gift card bought, you will receive a $10 gift card FREE. It’s perfect for any book lover, and it will make a great last-minute gift or stocking stuffer.

Let THEM decide what they want… you’ll give them the pleasure of picking from tens of thousands of used and new books and toys. Gottwals Books gift cards are redeemable at any of our Middle Georgia stores (Byron, Macon, Perry, and Warner Robins).

Walls of Books D.C. Coming Soon!

Walls of Books, D.C. will open January 2016. Check out these photos we took during various phases of the transformation. You’ll see the finished product soon. We are very proud of Pablo Sierra and his beautiful new bookstore.

 

Books and Gifts

In addition to books and gift cards, check out our calendars, Lithograph posters, and literary pouches/tote bags. You can also celebrate LOCAL business, showing your love for Gottwals Books by purchasing one of our new t-shirts!
